Father.secretDia: What do you plan on doing with that bottle, hahah you think you can drink at your age?

Father.dialogue: That is none of your (profanity) business

Father.response: Well i think it is... and i have not been feeling well lately
Father.dialogue: You don't look sick to me, how about i help you with that?

Father.response: No im okay.. anyways how are you feeling after the incident?
Father.dialogue: well... it was something you know, i have not fully recovered from it.

Father.response: Im suprised i thought you never loved her...
Wow since when do you have feelings?
Father.dialogue: Shut the (profanity) up and get out of my sight
Cat got your tongue? get out of here and stop wasting my time

Mother.dialogue: Hello my boy, how are you?
Mother.secretDia: Now son, i do not want you around those items, or else you will become like your father

Mother.response: How are you coping with everything?
Mother.dialogue: Yeah.. well it has been tough, sorry but i do not really want to talk about it
Mother.secretDia: Sorry mom i will put it away

Mother.response: No worries mother, but i think talking about her will help both of us
Mother.dialogue: Yeah, but if i mention her again your Father will beat me again
Don't say that son, he is just coping it differently

Mother.response: Does that give him an excuss to beat us half to death?
BUT WHAT? YOU ARE GETTING BEATEN HALF TO DEATH WHILST I WATCH ON THE SIDE
